tossup_question: 19) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following terms best describes the albedo of a planet:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) electromagnetic energy
X) density
Y) reflectivity
Z) absorption
bonus_question: 19) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following is NOT true of what occurs during an equinox:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) equal length of day and night except at the poles
X) the Earth is not tilted with respect to the ecliptic
Y) the Sun is directly overhead at the equator
Z) the Moon is directly overhead at the poles
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) THE MOON IS DIRECTLY OVERHEAD AT THE POLES
